errors.error_description: The instructions for local development incorrectly state to run `pip install -e .` before cloning the repository, which will fail because the necessary `setup.py` file is not present.
correction_candidates: Combine the commands into a single line: `git clone https://github.com/ai4co/rl4co && cd rl4co && pip install -e .`
Swap the two lines. The `git clone` command must be executed before `pip install -e .`.
Add `python setup.py develop` after the `git clone` command and remove `pip install -e .`.
errors.golden_answer: Swap the two lines. The `git clone` command must be executed before `pip install -e .`.

errors.error_description: The README provides an incorrect file path to the experiment configurations directory, referencing `config/experiments/` instead of the correct `configs/experiment/`.
